00019 #ifndef _FFT_ACTION_CALIBRATOR_HPP_cm101026_
00020 #define _FFT_ACTION_CALIBRATOR_HPP_cm101026_
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <stdexcept>
00025 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/make_shared.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00030 
00031 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00032 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/Calibration.hpp"
00033 #include "FFTProcessor/Proxy.hpp"
00034 #include "FFTProcessor/Action.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace Action {
00037   class Calibrator : public Base {
00038   public:
00039     Calibrator(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00040       : Base("Calibrator")
00041       , resultKey_(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.name"))
00042       , offsetMax_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.maxOffset_Hz")) 
00043       , ppmMax_   (config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.maxCorrectionFactor_ppm")) {
00044       using boost::property_tree::ptree;
00045       BOOST_FOREACH(const ptree::value_type input, config.get_child("Inputs")) {
00046         if (input.first == "Input") {
00047           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("Calibrator::Calibrator Input.%s") 
00048                        % input.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.key")));
00049           inputs_.push_back(input.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.key"));
00050         } else {
00051           LOG_WARNING(str(boost::format("Calibrator::calibrate unknown field %s") % input.first));
00052         }
00053       }
00054     }
00055     virtual ~Calibrator() {}
00056     virtual void perform(Proxy::Base& p, const SpectrumBase& s) {
00057       // count data
00058       std::vector<Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle> peaks;
00059       BOOST_FOREACH(const std::string& input, inputs_) {
00060         try {
00061           Result::SpectrumPeak::Handle 
00062             sp(boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Result::SpectrumPeak>(p.getResult(input)));
00063           if (sp != 0)
00064             peaks.push_back(sp);
00065         } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00066           LOG_WARNING(e.what());
00067         }
00068       }
00069       try {     
00070         Result::Base::Handle rh(new Result::Calibration(p.getApproxPTime(), peaks,
00071                                                         offsetMax_, ppmMax_));
00072         p.putResult(resultKey_, rh); 
00073       } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00074         LOG_WARNING(e.what());
00075       }
00076     }
00077   private:
00078     std::string resultKey_;           // result key name
00079     double offsetMax_;                // max offset [Hz]
00080     double ppmMax_;                   // max ppm
00081     std::vector<std::string> inputs_; // key names of inputs used for calibration
00082   } ;
00083 } // namespace Action
00084 
00085 #endif // _FFT_ACTION_CALIBRATOR_HPP_cm101026_
